title: You Had A Nightmare Related To Him, Right? (Part 1)
body:
You Had A Nightmare Related To Him, Right? (Part 1)

Ben pressed his feet on the ground and charged towards Ian. His body shone with dense golden light as it smashed down his fist at him.

Ian stood his ground as his body burst forth with sword light.

He lifted his sword and summoned tens of sword projectiles to meet Ben's attack head on.

Fist clashed against the sword light as the surrounding around them was destroyed.

With his brute strength, Ben destroyed many sword projectiles, but there were too many of them.

In the end, those sword projectlines destroyed the golden aura around Ben that was protecting him, and landed directly on his body.

Ben's body was blasted away because of the impact of the sword projectiles, as blood continues to flow out from the numerous wounds on his body.

Boooooomm-!

Ben's body crashed far into the distance creating a small crater there.

Ian followed him closely and went after him. But when he moved towards Ben he saw another hunter standing there.
